LandingPage.description: A Chrome Extension to blaze through your tabs, bookmarks, and history â€” with powerful fuzzy Pinyin search and grouping tags by AI

1.title: Fuzzy Pinyin Search
1.description: Supports Chinese/English hybrid fuzzy search, sorted by weight and recent usage for faster targeting

2.title: AI Grouping
2.description: AI-powered tab grouping based on domain and title, with 16-second snapshot recovery

3.title: Global Second-level Search
3.description: Search all tabs, bookmarks and 14-day history, supports /t /b /h targeted search

4.title: Full Keyboard Operation
4.description: Shortcut key activation,/ commands to trigger, type /s to enter configuration page for custom appearance and shortcuts

footer.description: Supercharge your browsing experience with Blazwitcher.
